channel.title: Anti-Duper
channel.description: Its not really an Anti-Duper I need. I just need a program that will find dupers and put their usernames into a file. If you could give me one or tell me where to get one and how to use it/where to put the application/files that would be great!

item.title: Anti-Duper
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Websterscape ftw, post:7, topic:317271”]Make it so it checks thier bak and items when they first login. If they have an unsual amount, Say 50 whips, make a text file…

Then do something like
if (playerHasItem(4151, 50) || playerCheckbank(4151, 50)){
(put a ban method here if you like);
Put a method that puts thier name in a file here;
}

So simple…idk your method so you have to find that out yourself.[/quote]

if (playerHasItem(4151, 50) || playerCheckbank(4151, 50)){

should be

if (playerHasItem(4151, 50) && playerCheckbank(4151, 50)){

becuase

if (playerHasItem(4151, 50) || playerCheckbank(4151, 50)){

is an or

and a &&

means and

so this statement

if (playerHasItem(4151, 50) || playerCheckbank(4151, 50)){

will not always be accurate

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-Duper
item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

[quote=“Owner_Of_GdogScape, post:3, topic:317271”][quote author=jamessemple link=topic=413817.msg3047194#msg3047194 date=1259820573]
stop posting multiple threads and try using something we like to call ‘google’ -.-
[/quote]
Maybe I already tried searching on google and I couldn’t find it.
So I wanted to know if anyone could help me here, But apparently some people in the moparscape community just don’t care.[/quote]¨¨

yA I KNow!!

Many here does just not understand that we search first!!

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-Duper
item.dc:creator: @Websterscape_ftw Websterscape ftw
item.description:
@Websterscape_ftw wrote:

Make it so it checks thier bak and items when they first login. If they have an unsual amount, Say 50 whips, make a text file…

Then do something like
if (playerHasItem(4151, 50) || playerCheckbank(4151, 50)){
(put a ban method here if you like);
Put a method that puts thier name in a file here;
}

So simple…idk your method so you have to find that out yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-Duper
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

Spades:

Maybe instead of finding the dupers themselves you should find out how they dupe and stop it. Seeing how that would be easier then having your players run around with duped items that your duper names file might not always catch or put players who have never duped have their name in that file. I’ve seen many servers with this folder in it but never had any purpose for it. Just took up space on my computer.

Well, I have an Anti-Duper. But I’m not sure if its working correctly I just want little backup just incase its not working correctly.

Read full topic
